app.mainwindow

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.ControllerBase
      • app.mainwindow.MainWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MainWindowController
extends ControllerBase
    Controller for the Main Window in the application.

    This class handles the user interactions within the Main Window, such as executing SQL queries, importing databases, saving changes, and displaying the results in the console and result tabs.

    See Also:
    ControllerBase, Window

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Initializes the controller and associates it with the Main Window.
        Parameters:
        location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
        resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      • handleImportDatabase

        public boolean handleImportDatabase()
        Handles the action of importing a database file into the application. This method is invoked when the user clicks the "Import Database" option in the File menu.
        Returns:
        true if the database was imported successfully, false otherwise

      • handleImportDatabase

        public boolean handleImportDatabase(javafx.stage.Stage ownerStage,
                                    boolean isFromWelcomeWindow)
        Handles the action of importing a database file into the application.
        Parameters:
        ownerStage - the owner Stage for the file chooser dialog
        isFromWelcomeWindow - true if the import is from the welcome window, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if the database was imported successfully, false otherwise

      • handleRun

        public void handleRun()
        Handles the action of running the SQL queries from the editor area. This method is invoked when the user clicks the "Run" button or presses the SHIFT + F10 shortcut.

      • executeQuery

        public void executeQuery(java.lang.String queries)
        Executes the given SQL queries in the database and displays the results in the application.
        Parameters:
        queries - the SQL queries to execute

      • executeQueryFromContextMenu

        public void executeQueryFromContextMenu(java.lang.String query)
        Helper function for showing/dropping tables from the tables list in the Main Window.
        Parameters:
        query - the SQL query to execute

      • updateTablesList

        public void updateTablesList()
        Updates the list of tables displayed in the Main Window.

      • removeTableFromList

        public void removeTableFromList(java.lang.String tableName)
        Removes the specified table from the list of tables displayed in the Main Window. This method is invoked when the user drops a table from the tables list.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to remove

      • clearTablesList

        public void clearTablesList()
        Clears the list of tables displayed in the Main Window. This method is invoked when the user imports a new database file.

      • addToHistory

        public void addToHistory(java.lang.String query,
                         boolean success)
        Adds the given query to the history list.
        Parameters:
        query - the SQL query to add
        success - true if the query was executed successfully, false otherwise

        Parameters:
